video_prompt: An anime-style character with vibrant green hair subtly shifts expression, from neutral to a slight smile. Text elements animate and fade in/out, including large vertical "BANON" and "CHLY" lettering. A large red graphic subtly pulsates, and neon green Japanese katakana characters shimmer. Subtle movements in the background, like a gentle ripple, indicate changes in the neon green environment.
image_prompt: Vibrant, modern anime-style advertisement featuring a girl with bright green hair and clear glasses. Dominant neon green background with bold black and white text (Chinese, Japanese Katakana "ギレッド", English "BANON", "CHLY."). The character wears a white top with a red graphic and black choker. Graphic and energetic aesthetic with a touch of red.
refined_video_prompt: A character's expression subtly shifts, from neutral to a slight smile. Text elements animate and fade in/out, including "BANON" and "CHLY." A graphic subtly pulsates. Japanese katakana characters shimmer. The background subtly moves, showing a gentle ripple and indicating environmental changes.
